content: this simple jar cozy fits a 24-ounce wide mouth ball jar 6 88 in tall 3 5 in outside diameter skills required * single_crochet * magic_ring cast on link to tutorial provided * single_crochet through the back loop * single_crochet increase i m so excited to share this pattern with you for free as part of my participation in #plasticfreejuly having a re-usable cup/jar/bottle is a great yet simple way to avoid needing to buy/use plastic this is especially important at a time when many recyclable items simply are not being recycled the lion brand re-up yarn is a great pairing for this project as they say on their website 1 it takes on average 20 000 liters of water to make 1 kilogram of cotton by using one 70 gram ball of re-up you are saving 1 400 liters of water just want to make this because it s fun great no judgement here this cozy looks awesome keeps your beverage cold or hot and prevents condensation from leaving a puddle in your wake on these hot summer days if you like this pattern please add it to your favorites or queue- or better yet tell a friend if you post about it on instagram please use #ballbandcozy and tag me @bostonjen1 2 or come chat about it in our down cellar studio podcast ravelry group 3 1 http //www lionbrand com/re-up-yarn html 2 https //www instagram com/bostonjen1/ 3 https //www ravelry com/groups/down-cellar-studio-podcast
